summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the sale of certain facilities and assignment of certain easements to Puget Sound Power & Light Company, a Washington corporation, of certain City (Lighting Department) property in King County, Washington, consisting of that portion of the City's Seattle-Tacoma 115 k.v. Tie Line now in place along the West Valley Highway (SR 131) from and including the first pole south of South 180th Street to and including the first pole south of Meeker Street (old SR 516) in Kent, Washington.
